page.title: 11DAGLINGWORTH QUARRY CONT.
page.content: It has power steering and could travel at 40 M.P.H unladen. A loading shovel is a kind of digger only much bigger. It has a steel catterpiller track instead of wheels, these give a much better grip. The loading shovels load the dumper trucks with rocks. The Manager of Kingston Minerals is Mr. Smith, he has 11 men working under him. They wear protective clothes including steel caps on their boots and a hard helmet. When the quarry is exhausted a massive hole will remain. This will be used as a council rubbish tip until it is filled up.
